title: Sandboxing Blazor WebAssemblies in lieu of AppDomain Sandboxing
body:
I need a way to securely load assemblies created by 3rd parties on a multi tenant server that may perform a variety of tasks.

What are my choices beyond what is listed below, and what is the most ideal?

  • WebAssembly rehosting (perhaps borrow ideas from Blazor WASM Unit testing?)
  • Silverlight (no.)
  • AppDomain
  • URL to an Azure Function app (how do function apps work? CScript might work as well)
  • MicroServices (I don't know enough about this, I just need to load and run a DLL function)
